name: test_light_push_with_valid_timestamps
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Timestamps failed: [{'description': 'Now', 'value': 1720581117291053056, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Far future', 'value': 2035941117291030784, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Recent past', 'value': 1720577517291030784, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Near future', 'value': 1720584717291030784, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Positive number', 'value': 1, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Negative number', 'value': -1, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'DST change', 'value': 1583632800000000000, 'valid_for': ['nwaku', 'gowaku']}, {'description': 'Missing', 'value': None, 'valid_for': ['gowaku']}]
